Common.dearDaysSplashInfo:
Every day deserves a 
 dear place.
Common.welcomeNote: For couples who want to treasure their journey, one memory at a time.

Register.registerInfo: Sign up simply with your Google account and start saving memories.

Moment.title: Moments
Moment.noMoment: Hey, go ahead and drop your memories here!
Moment.noTodo: Hey, share some fun ideas to do together!

Terms.aboutUsDetails: Hi! We’re a husband and wife who love creating things together. Dear Days started as a small idea — a way to keep our memories in one place and celebrate the little moments that make every day special. We decided to turn that idea into an app, hoping it helps other couples do the same — to remember, smile, and stay connected through their own “dear days”.
Terms.contact: We’d love to hear from you — whether it’s feedback, questions, or freelance opportunities. Let’s connect!
